events.title: Alcohol Ink X Sound Bath Healing
events.description:
． Healing through beginner-friendly art creation
零基礎體會創作藝術的療癒

． Immerse in the sound and vibrations
讓身體沐浴在聲音與振頻之中

時間 Time : 13/Apr  4-6:00 PM 
地點 Location：Sheung Wan上環

events.title: Charity Bhakti Yoga Picnic
events.description:
・邀請各參加者提供食物作野餐
Invite participants to provide food for picnic 

・善款將會送到尼泊爾
Donations will be sent to Nepal 

・幫助山區兒童學習
Help mountain children learn 

・部份善款將會用作表演者基本交通費開支
The Donation will be used to deduct the basic performers transportation expenses 

時間Time ：05/Apr 2-3:30 
地點Location：港島區 HK Island
